repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:6.9.5 
ENV PORT 8080 
EXPOSE ${PORT} 

ENV NPM_CONFIG_LOGLEVEL warn 

RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app && rm -rf /usr/src/app
WORKDIR /usr/src/app 

COPY ./package.json . 
RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;

COPY ./test.js . 
COPY ./src ./src 

ENTRYPOINT ["npm"] 
CMD ["start"]
